story.text: The [[Outlandish Academy]] is based around the idea of small study groups - a group of people working together and sharing research and learning on a particular topic. Other names for such groups are [[pods]], [[learning pod]]s, [[cells]], or [[happenings]].
There is an extensive history of this form of research and group learning - in particular the idea of a [[Study Circle]] as practiced in Sweden and other countries.

# See also

- [[Study circle]]
- [[Pods]]
- [[Learning Pods]]
- [[Tribes]]
- [[Crew]]
- [[Cell]]
- [[Academy Methodology]]
- [[Outlandish Methodology]]
- Mozilla Science study group handbook - [http://mozillascience.github.io/studyGroupHandbook/ github.io]

There is an extensive history of this form of research and group learning - in particular the idea of a [[Study Circle]] as practiced in Sweden and other countries.

Leaning PODs, Cells, or Happenings...

The [[Outlandish Academy]] is based around the idea of small study groups - a group of people working together and sharing research and learning on a particular topic. Other names for such groups are [[Learning POD]]s, [[Cells]], or [[Happenings]].
